statements: SELECT * FROM wind_monitoring;
SELECT altitude, wind_speed FROM wind_monitoring WHERE wind_speed > 10;
SELECT wind_direction FROM wind_monitoring WHERE altitude BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM wind_monitoring ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT altitude, wind_speed, wind_direction FROM wind_monitoring WHERE altitude < 500;
SELECT * FROM wind_monitoring WHERE altitude > 100 AND wind_speed < 20 ORDER BY wind_speed DESC, altitude DESC;
SELECT altitude, wind_speed FROM wind_monitoring WHERE wind_direction = 'North' ORDER BY altitude ASC;
SELECT MAX(wind_speed) AS max_wind_speed FROM wind_monitoring;
SELECT altitude, AVG(wind_speed) AS avg_wind_speed FROM wind_monitoring GROUP BY altitude HAVING avg_wind_speed > 15 ORDER BY altitude ASC;
SELECT * FROM wind_monitoring WHERE altitude BETWEEN 50 AND 200 AND wind_direction IN ('North', 'South') ORDER BY altitude ASC, wind_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM WindData;
SELECT wind_speed, wind_direction FROM WindData WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT altitude, wind_speed FROM WindData WHERE wind_speed < 10.5 ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT wind_direction FROM WindData WHERE altitude < 500 OR altitude > 2000;
SELECT altitude_id, altitude_name FROM AltitudeInfo ORDER BY altitude_id ASC;
SELECT altitude, wind_speed, wind_direction FROM WindData WHERE altitude > 100 ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM WindData WHERE wind_direction = 'N' OR wind_direction = 'S' ORDER BY altitude ASC;
SELECT altitude_id, altitude_name FROM AltitudeInfo WHERE altitude_name LIKE '%High%' ORDER BY altitude_id;
SELECT AVG(wind_speed) AS avg_speed, MAX(wind_speed) AS max_speed FROM WindData;
SELECT wind_speed, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM WindData GROUP BY wind_speed HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT altitude, wind_speed, direction FROM WindSpeedAtAltitude;
SELECT location_name, country FROM AltitudeLocations WHERE altitude = 10000;
SELECT max_wind_speed, avg_wind_speed FROM WindSpeedStatistics WHERE altitude > 20000;
SELECT * FROM WindSpeedAtAltitude ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT location_name, country FROM AltitudeLocations WHERE location_name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT altitude, wind_speed, direction FROM WindSpeedAtAltitude WHERE altitude > 100 ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT altitude, location_name, country FROM AltitudeLocations WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY altitude ASC;
SELECT altitude, min_wind_speed, max_wind_speed, avg_wind_speed FROM WindSpeedStatistics WHERE avg_wind_speed BETWEEN 10.0 AND 20.0 ORDER BY altitude;
SELECT AVG(wind_speed) AS avg_speed, COUNT(*) AS count FROM WindSpeedAtAltitude GROUP BY altitude HAVING count > 2 ORDER BY avg_speed DESC;
SELECT altitude, wind_speed, direction FROM WindSpeedAtAltitude WHERE direction LIKE '%North%' AND wind_speed > 20.0 ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM AltitudeLevels;
SELECT altitude_id, altitude_name FROM AltitudeLevels ORDER BY altitude_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM WindData WHERE wind_speed > 20;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM SensorData WHERE altitude_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name FROM Device WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM AltitudeLevels;
SELECT altitude_id, altitude_name FROM AltitudeLevels ORDER BY altitude_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM AltitudeLevels JOIN WindData ON AltitudeLevels.altitude_id = WindData.altitude_id;
SELECT altitude_name, wind_speed, wind_direction FROM AltitudeLevels JOIN WindData ON AltitudeLevels.altitude_id = WindData.altitude_id WHERE wind_speed >= 10;
SELECT device_name, sensor_value, timestamp FROM Device JOIN SensorData ON Device.device_id = SensorData.device_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT altitude_name, wind_speed FROM altitude_data;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM sensor_measurement WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT measurement_time, measurement_value FROM measurement_data WHERE measurement_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM altitude_data ORDER BY altitude_name DESC, altitude_id ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;

SELECT s.sensor_name, m.measurement_value, m.measurement_time FROM sensor_data s JOIN sensor_measurement sm ON s.sensor_id = sm.sensor_id JOIN measurement_data m ON m.measurement_id = sm.measurement_id WHERE s.sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT altitude_name, wind_speed, wind_direction FROM altitude_data WHERE wind_speed > 20 AND wind_direction = 'North' ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM measurement_data WHERE measurement_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
